overview: When truckers have been on the road for really long hours, they get fatigued, but in certain ways that relax alone cannot correct. They need pussy to rejuvenate them and help them get in GEAR!!! Watch as these Truck Stop Angels lend a helping twat to these trucker's cocks!! What fun deviant fun you'll have!!
tagline: Hey, Mac, How's Your Peter Built?
title: Truck Stop Angel
